mapper.sql: service_order_id, agent_id, service_tag_id, service_user_lat, service_user_lon, service_tag_name, service_order_number, service_order_bespeak, service_order_effect_time, service_order_send_user, service_order_receive_user, service_order_type, service_order_small_type, service_order_title, service_order_content, service_order_start_amount, service_order_distance_amount, service_order_weight_amount, service_order_attach_amount, service_order_amount, service_order_good_amount, service_order_pay_amount, service_order_state, service_order_remark, service_order_delivery_contact_name, service_order_delivery_address, service_order_delivery_contact_number, service_order_delivery_address_lon, service_order_delivery_address_lat, service_order_pickup_address, service_order_pickup_address_lon, service_order_pickup_address_lat, service_order_pickup_contact_number, service_order_pickup_contact_name, service_order_weight, service_order_distance, service_order_create_time, service_order_modify_time, service_order_all_see_time, service_order_finsh_time, service_order_is_comment, service_order_night_amount, service_order_price_coeffcient, service_order_attachment, service_pay_type, service_agent_amount, service_admin_amount, service_order_source, service_order_source_id, service_order_urge, service_order_abnormal,station_id,service_station_amount
mapper.select:
select sum( case when name = 1 and col < 100 then col << 14 when name = 1 and col > 99 then 100 << 14 when name = 2 and col < 100 then col << 7 when name = 2 and col > 99 then 100 << 7 when name = 3 and col > 99 then 100 when name = 3 and col < 100 then col end ) from (
select 0 col ,1 name
select count(*) col ,1 name from huawu_service_order where service_user_lon between (${lon}-0.22) and (${lon}+0.22) and agent_id in (0,${isAgent}) and service_user_lat between (${lat}-0.22) and (${lat}+0.22) and service_order_state in (40,50)
union all select count(*) col ,2 name from huawu_service_order where service_order_state = 60 and service_order_receive_user = #{runerid} union all select count(*) col ,3 name from huawu_service_order where service_order_state in(70,80,90) and service_order_receive_user = #{runerid} ) a
